DOC.brief_summary: Repeated implantation failure（RIF） insurmountable bottleneck assist reproductive technology , many study consider cause two-thirds implant failure decrease endometrial receptivity . Human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) early pre-plant signal molecule secrete embryo , promote endometrial proliferation , increase blood flow promote embryonic adhesion inhibit self-regulate apoptosis trophoblast cell . Previous study show : intrauterine injection HCG embryo transfer improve clinical outcome IVF/Intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) . But study find intrauterine injection HCG significantly improve success rate blastocyst transfer , reason may intrauterine injection HCG time late significantly increase implantation rate . Would ahead intrauterine injection HCG effective ? Thus , patient repeat implantation frozen embryo cycle accord random principle accept two kind transplant way : ①intrauterine injection HCG blastocyst transfer ; ②blastocyst transfer . Try understand whether intrauterine injection HCG significantly improve clinical pregnancy rate blastocyst transfer repeat implantation failure patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Intrauterine Injection HCG Pregnancy Outcome Repeated Implantation Failure Patients
DOC.criteria: woman unexplained RIF ( two four previous embryo transfer without achieve pregnancy ) ; age＜36 year ; frozen embryo transfer cycle polycystic ovary syndrome uterine abnormality ( double uterus , bicornuate uterus , unicornuate uterus uterine mediastinum ) intrauterine adhesion endometriosis adenomyosis hydrosalpinx uterine fibroid ( submucosal fibroid , nonmucosal fibroid > 4 cm / endometrial pressure ) thydroid dysfunction hyperprolactinemia
